description: This course is a continuation of CHEM 247 topics. Chemistry 248 delves into the chemistry of functional groups, especially those that play a role in the reactivity of biomolecules such as carbohydrates, lipids, proteins ,and nucleic acids. Together, CHEM 247 and CHEM 248 provide a full treatment of introductory organic chemistry. Offered annually during Spring semester. Prerequisite: CHEM 247 or permission of instructor.
name: Organic Chemistry II
notes: Students in Chem 248 must also register for one Chem 254 lab.
This course has class-year limits for juniors and seniors.
